tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE daily_calorie_tracking (
  date DATE,
  daily_calories INT,
  goal_calories INT
)

CREATE TABLE Users (
	user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	name VARCHAR(255),
	age INT,
	weight FLOAT,
	height FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE user_info (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR,
    age INT,
    weight FLOAT,
    height FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE meal_history (
    user_id UUID,
    date DATE,
    meal_name VARCHAR,
    calories_consumed INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id, date, meal_name)
);

CREATE TABLE users (
	user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	name VARCHAR(50),
	age INT,
	gender VARCHAR(10),
	weight FLOAT,
	height FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE meals (
	meal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
	meal_name VARCHAR(50),
	calories INT,
	date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE goals (
	goal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
	target_weight FLOAT,
	daily_calorie_goal INT,
	start_date DATE,
	end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE weight_log (
	log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
	weight FLOAT,
	log_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE activity_log (
	activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
	activity_type VARCHAR(50),
	duration_minutes INT,
	activity_date DATE
)
